程序包 android.car.hardware.power

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    CarPowerManager.CarPowerPolicyListener
    Listeners to receive power policy change.
    CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListener
    Applications set a CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListener for power state event updates.
    CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion
    Applications set a CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion for power state event updates where a CarPowerManager.CompletablePowerStateChangeFuture is used.
    CarPowerManager.CompletablePowerStateChangeFuture
    An interface passed from CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    CarPowerManager
    API to receive power policy change notifications.
    CarPowerPolicy
    Car power policy definition.
    CarPowerPolicyFilter
    Filter to receive power policy changes that a listener is interested in.
    CarPowerPolicyFilter.Builder
    A builder for CarPowerPolicyFilter
    PowerComponentUtil
    Utility class used when dealing with PowerComponent.
  • 注释类型概要 
    注释类型 说明
    CarPowerManager.CarPowerState  
    PowerComponent
    Copy from android.frameworks.automotive.powerpolicy-java-source/gen/android/frameworks/automotive /powerpolicy/PowerComponent.java.
    PowerComponentUtil.ComponentState
